Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「プレシャスツール」
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: コラ！ ガジュマが 人の家で何をしとるか！ さっさと出て行け、ドロボーめ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what do you think you're doing here, Gajuma!? Get out before I call the guards on you!
Entry.Notes: deepL says: Kola! Gajuma! What are you doing in my house? Get the hell out of here, you slob!

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん、うちに何の用だ……？ 客か……？
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... What do you want, customer?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、いらっしゃい。 何にするかね？
Entry.EnglishText: Hiiiii, welcome! Anything catch your eye?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Items Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: 用がないならさっさと 出て行くんだな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're not buying anything, then get the hell out.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、まいど。 またよろしくな。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you! Please come again!

Entry.JapaneseText: はいよ、またな。
Entry.EnglishText: Here you go. Come again!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ガジュマが人の家を 勝手にうろつくんじゃない！ すぐに出て行け！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma aren't allowed to loiter around here. Leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ガジュマなんぞを 連れて、この街を歩くな！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, don't be walking around town with that filthy Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 召使いのガジュマなら、 物置にでも突っ込んどけ！
Entry.EnglishText: If that beast is your servant, then leave it in the shed or something!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえさんたち…… この街の者じゃないな。 だが、ヒューマなら大歓迎だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You... You're not from here, are you? Well, you're Huma, anyway. Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサスは大昔、ヒューマが 知恵と技術をもって開拓した ヒューマの街なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: A long time ago, Belsas was built by Huma using their superior knowledge and technology...

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、スカラベさんが ガジュマを追い出したのは 当然なんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: That's why it's just natural for Lord Scarabe to chase those filthy animals away.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマめ！ とっとと出て行け！
Entry.EnglishText: Get the hell out of here, Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマならヒューマらしく、 ガジュマなんかと一緒に 歩いたりするんじゃない！
Entry.EnglishText: If you're a Huma, then you should act like one. We Huma don't walk around with beasts.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたちが来てから、 街のガジュマどもの様子が おかしくなった！
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since you lot came here, those Gajuma have started to act strange!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたち、 何を企んどるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: What are you planning?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもが、女王様を連れて スカラベさんのところに行った そうだが……
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that those Gajuma took the Queen with them to Scarabe's mansion. but...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっくりさんじゃないのか？ どうやってベルサスのガジュマが 女王様と知り合うんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: I think they're a look-alike. How on earth did those filthy creatures even manage to get THE QUEEN here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは……信じんぞ！ あれが本物の女王様である はずがないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: I... I'm very sure that she's not the real Queen! There's no way!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもめ、偽者を使って うまい事やりおったな！
Entry.EnglishText: Hah, shrewd Gajuma. You lot managed to make a very convincing impostor.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえたち、あの偽者の 女王様を助けたのなら、 スカラベさんも助けてくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey you, if you guys managed to save that impostor then you have to save Scarabe too!

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人は悪くない…… 悪いのはガジュマだ……
Entry.EnglishText: That person did nothing wrong... It's all those Gajuma's fault!

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍が何と言おうと、 ワシはガジュマなんぞと 協力する気はないぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: What is the Army thinking? I have no intention of ever cooperating with Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと協力するのも、 ガジュマを嫌うのも、 個人の勝手だと思わんか！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think it's up to the individual, whether or not they get along with or hate Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 嫌う理由などない！ 嫌いだから嫌いなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need a reason to hate them! I hate them because I do!

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはとにかく ガジュマが嫌いなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Anyways, I hate Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 理由なんぞ……ない！ なくたって、いいだろうに！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need a reason! Respect my opinions!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマと協力するのも、 ガジュマを嫌うのも、 個人の勝手だと思わんか！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think it's up to the individual, whether or not they get along with or hate Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: 嫌う理由などない！ 嫌いだから嫌いなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: I don't need a reason to hate them! I hate them because I do!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、寝不足なんだ……！ ああ、眠くてイライラする。
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't been able to sleep recently, it's getting on my nerves!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音のせいだ…… いや、ガジュマのせいだ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's all because of this sound... No! Because of those Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、寝不足なんだ……！ ああ、眠くてイライラする。
Entry.EnglishText: I haven't been able to sleep recently, it's getting on my nerves!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音のせいだ…… いや、ガジュマのせいだ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's all because of this sound... No! Because of those Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは理由もなく ガジュマが嫌いなんだ…… だが、それでいいのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajuma even if I have no reason to, but... Is it right to...?

Entry.JapaneseText: それを考えるだけで…… 夜も眠れないんだ…… 眠い……眠い……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't sleep because I keep wondering about that... Oh... So sleepy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはヒューマだ…… ガジュマではない…… だが同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>だ……
Entry.EnglishText: I am a Huma, not a Gajuma... But we're both similar <Yellow>people<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 違う理由は何だ…… ではなぜ同じなんだ……？ ワシはもうわからん……眠い……
Entry.EnglishText: Why are both different, yet so similar...? I cannot comprehend... So sleepy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシはヒューマもガジュマも 同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>だという前提で 考えてみた……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking lately. What if Huma and Gajuma are both similar <Yellow>people<White>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>は誰ひとり同じ姿の者は おらん……つまり、種族などと いうのはその程度のものなんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: No two <Yellow>people<White> look the same... Which is why races and such are just that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姿の違いは個性だ…… 考え方の違いは、話し合う事で 共通点が見つかるはずだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those who look different, and those who think different should come together and look for common ground...
Entry.Notes: deepL says: Differences in appearance are individuality. ...... Differences in the way we think can be discussed. You'll find common ground. ......

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはこの街には 必要ない存在なのだ！ わかったら、出ていけ！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma are unnecessary for this town, get that? Now leave!

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベさんはこの街の 英雄的存在なのだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Scarabe is regarded as something like a hero here.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人を悪く言う事は 許さんぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: I won't permit anyone to speak ill of him!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『グミの棚』 グレープグミ、ライムグミ、 ピーチグミなどが並ぶ棚。 ぷるるんとしていて、ついつい 触りたくなってしまう。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- A shelf lined up with Grape Gels, Lime Gels, and Peach Gels. You can't help but want to touch them with how they jiggle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『キャラクター人形』 ウサギのジャンプちゃんと カエルのジャンプくん。 この店のオリジナル商品だが、 現在品切中。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Character Puppets - A display for the shop's mascot characters: Bouncing Bunny and Frolicking Froggy. They are currently out of stock.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『文房具の棚』 各種文房具が並んでいる。 最近のヒット商品は 「二十面筆入れ」と、 「香りつきネリケシ」。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Shelf of Stationeries - The shelf displays all sorts of stationeries. Current best sellers are: the "20-sided Pencil Case" and "Scented Erasers."

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ボトルの棚』 棚に並んでいるのはボトルの見本品。 実はお酒が入っていて、ここの主人が 仕事中にコッソリ飲んでいる。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Shelf of Bottles - The shelf displays a lot of empty bottles. These bottles used to contain alcohol, but the shop owner used to sneak a drink or two while on shift until they were empty..

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『おみやげ用のクツと服』 旅の記念に、なんとなく買ってしまうが、 これをもらっても、なかなか普段着には できない……のが哀しい。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Souvenir Clothes and Shoes - Can be bought by travelers and tourists, but are uncomfortable to wear for everyday use... Depressing.

Entry.JapaneseText:
<speed:0>『ベルサスポスター』 スカラベのアップがでかでかと 描かれたなんとも言えない商品。
スージーのポスターもあったが完売。
スカラベのポスターの方は 九割引のセール品だが、まだ在庫多数。
Entry.EnglishText:
<speed:0>- Belsas Poster - An indescribable poster of Lord Scarabe. The poster is being sold at 90% off, but there's still a lot left.
There also used to be one for Susie, but it was already sold out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『ドリアングミの標本（非売品）』 かつて発売されたドリアングミの標本。 これを食べると、バイラスが全く 寄りつかなくなるという品物。 しかし、一度食べたらその強烈な香りが 一週間もの間、取れない事が災いし、 市場から姿を消した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Durian Gel Samples (Not For Sale) - Durian Gel samples which were previously sold here. Eating them will completely keep Biruses away from you. However, it will leave you with intense bad breath that will last a whole week. Which made it completely fail in the market.
